crs.Name: O
crs.title: O + e $\rightarrow$ O(${^5}$S) emission (direct excitation + cascades)

Process.name: O+e->O(5S)
Process.Notes: Zipf 1985 reports on the paper by Stone and Zipf 1974. The 1974 paper appears to not be online; however, Avakyan divided its value by 3 (when one compare with the abstract of the 1974 paper; and it seems in agreement with the Figure 1 in Strickland and Anderson 1983). Zipf 1985 reports on an 'in-press' paper (Kao and Zipf 1985), but it does not appear to exist
